abstract: Valuation is the primary reason, but vulnerability to the Volcker rule is also cited.
snippet: Valuation is the primary reason, but vulnerability to the Volcker rule is also cited.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is trying to put its best foot forward, with the Tuesday release of a report on ways to improve its disclosure and business practices, but analysts at a JPMorgan unit in London have lowered their rating on the firm.
